1.0.name: wordpress/cipher
1.0.description:
Cipher empowers both your administration area (HTML editor) and comments section with a few features thought to simplify the publishing of code snippets.

Wrapping of pre-formatted text in <pre><code> tags

If the submitted comment contains a formatted chunk of code enclosed within the <code> tag, it automatically wraps it inside <pre><code>. The same applies to snippets longer than 100 characters.

Code encoding in comments

The code snippet is encoded and hardcoded into the comment, so, the deactivation of the plugin doesn't affect the rendering of the submitted code.

Backticks in comments

Backticks ( ` ` ) can be used to wrap code as an alternative to <code>. Backticks and <code> are mutually exclusive, this means that your readers can submit snippets containing <code> tags by wrap
